nodes.text: Piethet Brighteyes and the raiders of the Ryloth Ark

Piethet Brighteyes and the raiders of the Ryloth Ark was a work of fiction pertaining to the search for an ancient artifact known as the Ryloth Ark. When they were children, the brothers Treuten and Kosh Teradoc dreamed of reenacting that story, which later prompted them to join the naval forces of Palpatine's Galactic Empire.
The work's title is a reference to the 1981 film Raiders of the Lost Ark, another Lucasfilm Ltd. film and the first installment of the Indiana Jones franchise.
